intro: Don't waste food! A horror-flavored, exploration adventure to escape the apartment from the MOTTAINAI GHOST.
description:
Standing in your way as you attempt to escape the apartment building is none other than "leftover food."
By eating leftovers, your stomach level increases, allowing you to consume even larger portions.
Efficiently raising your stomach level is the key to escape.

Can you escape this harsh apartment building alone?

[Game Features]
A ghost story rooted in Japanese culture:
With the theme of MOTTAINAI (a sense of regret over waste), this game reimagines Japanese folklore as modern horror.
Experience the fear that lurks just beyond daily life.

Exploration-based horror:
Investigate each room of the apartment, uncovering hidden items and notes that bring you closer to the truth.

Game Over if caught by the MOTTAINAI GHOST:
The MOTTAINAI GHOST roams the building.
Your actions will determine your fate.

For those who are sensitive to horror:
While it includes some light jump scares, there is no grotesque imagery or violent content.

Still, it delivers a gloomy and unsettling atmosphere true to the horror genre.

Recommended as a “beginner-friendly horror” for those curious but easily frightened, and safe for children—designed for solo play.
